work.name: Yamini Innovations
work.description: My job was to create a better website both feature and performance-wise as compared to their existing one. It was also my responsibility to maintain the site and keep it secured from any security issues • Used WordPress for boosting the development time. • Increased performance & functionality than older website • Made website SEO and User friendly.

projects.title: iiLegal
projects.description: With the easy-to-use APIs and plugins, this project will allow you to find your location, change the map style to Satellite, Streets & Navigation or Outdoors. Along with this, we will be able to search for any location (Area) and receive directions from your source to your destination point with the option to choose from Traffic, Driving, Walking, or Cycling.
